short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install AliExpress™ & Alibaba™ image downloader and save product Images with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install Image Downloader for AliExpress™ chrome extension, the ultimate tool for AliExpress users! Download product images in high quality with ease.  

 

How to Use Image Downloader for AliExpress™?  

>> Install the extension by clicking on “Add To Chrome”  
>> Pin it to your Chrome toolbar for quick access. 
>> Visit an AliExpress product page. 
>> Click the download buttons for saving the image to your system   

 

Key Features  

>> One Click Image Download: Download product images, variation images effortlessly with a single click 
>> High-Quality Images: It enables you to ensure you get the best quality images with every download.
